summary: Innovative systems engineer focused on building scalable backend infrastructure, streamlining legacy systems, and implementing high-performance, secure automation solutions. Skilled in architecting resilient enterprise applications and aligning software delivery with strategic business needs.

highlights: Built biometric attendance tracking with ZK Teco devices – reduced payroll delay by 7 days.
Unified two legacy core banking systems into a single .NET application.
Implemented real-time Telegram Bot notifications – increased reliability by 99%.
Optimized SQL with indexing and caching – reduced report load time from minutes to <2 seconds.
Secured reporting platform with authentication and CORS.
Supervised junior developers and documented workflow for handover.
Migrated legacy system from .NET Framework 4.8.1 to .NET 7 – improved memory and startup performance.
Developed Python REST APIs and integrated with custom Odoo ERP.
Upgraded to Odoo 14 – enhanced eCommerce and inventory workflows.
Integrated ABA PayWay gateway – increased transaction speed and reliability by 30%.
Built Khmer Care platform – raised $70K+ and partnered with 30+ organizations.
Enhanced Firearms Metrics Platform – improved data accuracy and report performance.
Built POS system with inventory automation and scale integration.
Delivered Hotel Management System with real-time booking engine.
Developed Clinic Management System – reduced patient wait times via real-time scheduling and alerts.
Customized Odoo ERP for e-commerce enhancements.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.description: Optimized memory and SQL performance in a meal reporting application within 2 days.
